subject: Q4 Planning Meeting - Action Required
body:
Hi Team,

I'd like to schedule our Q4 planning meeting for next week. Please review the attached agenda and confirm your availability for Tuesday, November 26th at 2:00 PM.

We'll be discussing:
- Budget allocation for Q4
- New project initiatives
- Team resource planning

Please send your agenda items by end of day Friday.

Best regards,
Sarah

subject: Code Review Needed - Payment Module
body:
Hey,

I've just pushed the new payment module integration to the dev branch. Could you review the PR when you get a chance?

PR #234: Payment Gateway Integration
- Added Stripe integration
- Implemented error handling
- Added unit tests

Deadline: Please review by Thursday EOD so we can merge before the sprint ends.

Thanks!
Mike

subject: Reminder: Submit Your Timesheet by Friday
body:
Hello,

This is a friendly reminder to submit your timesheet for the current pay period.

Deadline: Friday, November 22nd at 5:00 PM

Please log into the HR portal and complete your timesheet submission. Late submissions may delay your paycheck processing.

If you have any questions, please contact the HR team.

Best regards,
HR Department

subject: URGENT: Verify Your Account Immediately
body:
Dear User,

Your account has been flagged for suspicious activity. You must verify your identity within 24 hours or your account will be permanently suspended.

CLICK HERE TO VERIFY NOW

This is an automated message. Do not reply to this email.

subject: Collaboration Opportunity - Q1 2026
body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out to discuss a potential collaboration opportunity for Q1 2026.

Our company is launching a new initiative that aligns perfectly with your team's expertise. I'd love to schedule a call to explore how we might work together.

Are you available for a 30-minute call next week? I'm flexible on timing.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
Alex Kim
Business Development Manager

subject: Scheduled Maintenance - Sunday 2AM
body:
Dear Team,

Please be advised of scheduled system maintenance:

Date: Sunday, November 24th
Time: 2:00 AM - 6:00 AM EST
Affected Systems: Production database, API servers

Expected downtime: 4 hours

What to expect:
- Production environment will be unavailable
- Staging environment remains operational
- All systems will be back online by 6:00 AM

Please plan accordingly and inform your teams.

Thank you,
DevOps Team

subject: Bug Report - Login Issue on Mobile
body:
Hi,

I've encountered a critical bug that needs immediate attention.

Issue: Users cannot log in on mobile devices (iOS and Android)
Severity: High
Affected Users: Approximately 30% of mobile users

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open app on mobile device
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Tap login button
4. App crashes

This needs to be fixed ASAP as it's affecting our user experience.

I've attached error logs.

Please prioritize this for the next hotfix release.

Thanks,
Emma

subject: Your Speaker Proposal Has Been Accepted!
body:
Congratulations!

We're excited to inform you that your speaker proposal has been accepted for Tech Conference 2026.

Session Title: "Building Scalable AI Applications"
Date: March 15, 2026
Time: 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM
Location: Main Hall

Next steps:
1. Confirm your attendance by December 1st
2. Submit your presentation slides by February 15th
3. Complete speaker registration form

We'll send more details in the coming weeks.

Congratulations again!

Tech Conference Team

subject: Invoice #INV-2025-1147 - Payment Due
body:

subject: Team Lunch - Friday at 12:30 PM
body:
Hey everyone,
